modules.description: Provides functions to monitor file system changes, including setting up watches and handling events on macOS and Linux. Works with file paths, event types, and callback handlers to trigger actions on modifications. Used to automatically update or reload data in applications when underlying files change.

Listens for file system changes on specified paths, triggering a callback function on modifications. Uses FSevents, Inotify, or polling based on system support. Tracks statistics and allows adjusting polling intervals for continuous monitoring.
